overview:
Moti held the position of Product Manager at Cash-U Mobile Technologies (now Unipier Ltd) where he managed the companyâ€™s flagship product until November 2004. Before that, he was a team leader in Cash-Uâ€™s Research & Development department, where he led the research, development and migration into the Smart Clients world.

Prior to Cash-U, Moti worked for VocalTec Communications (VoIP technology) as an R&D team leader, focusing on emerging technologies as part of the Next Generation group.

Moti is an IDF MAMRAM (Israel Defense Forces main programming, software engineering, and computer users training unit) graduate and holds a BA degree in Management and Computer Sciences from the Tel Aviv University.
